Text: 'Born of a Virgin' - Sorry, but when you lose touch with reality on one point - you lose any further credibilty (or is that the Devil's trickery?). My own brother believes in the Bible's mutterings, but how many generations and societies have believed in the 'end of days'? We are in a world of shit, but not to worry, when judgement day arrives - it won't matter if we are are enlightened or not, we will be judged on our souls alone.
